title: Transformation of Capricorn
description: January, 1st: Capricorn: Today seducing your crush has never been easier. The cosmos have already arranged for your prey to completely adore you. But watch out, because your crush might have some secrets....When the studious and anti-social Jasper Monte got accepted into Graves Academy, his future was so bright it was blinding. Up until graduation requirements forced him to join a club and make friends.As an Astronomy major, the Astrology Club was a no brainer, even if Professor Chase King is as insufferable as he is ridiculously good looking. Jasper's draw towards his teacher is all not-so-innocent fun and games until he stumbles upon Chase on the night of the full moon. Jasper might be the target of his cursed teacher's primal, uncontrollable lust, but he also might be the cure.The werewolves of the legends were nothing like this.When every month threatens a different transformation, will Jasper be willing to accept the risks that being with the professor entails?This is a sexy and dark story of a once innocent college boy and his dangerous shifter alpha professor. Each installment features a different Zodiac Sign transformation and creative ways to use it!
